info.title: Universal Inspirational Quotes
info.description: Display on your website, widget or app Inspirational Images, Motivational Pictures, Healing Quotes and more.

get.description: Delivers Inspirational Quotes - if used without parameters, it will return one random quote (default behavior)

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Id of the quote - if specified a random quote will not be returned.

parameters.name: maxR
parameters.description: Max number of quotes returned - Default: 1

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Defines the size of the image to be returned. Possible values: medium, thumbnail. Default value: thumbnail

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: List of topics within which selection one or several quotes will be returned
